sen.j: 朽木 綱条（くつき つなえだ）は、丹波国福知山藩の第11代藩主。
sen.e: Tsunaeda KUTSUKI was the eleventh lord of Fukuchiyama domain in Tanba Province.

sen.j: 享和元年（1801年）10月17日、第9代藩主・朽木倫綱の長男として生まれる。
sen.e: Born on October 17, 1801, as the first son of Tomotsuna KUTSUKI, the ninth lord of the domain.

sen.j: 享和2年（1802年）に父が死去したため、文化 (元号)元年（1804年）に第10代藩主・朽木綱方に養子として引き取られて養育された。
sen.e: Since his father died in 1802, he was adopted in 1804 and raised by Tsunakata KUTSUKI, the tenth lord of the domain.

sen.j: 文政4年（1821年）6月6日、綱方の隠居により家督を継いで第11代藩主となった。
sen.e: On June 6, 1821, he took over as head of the family and became the eleventh lord of the domain due to Tsunakata's retirement.
On July 5, 1821, he took over as head of the family and became the eleventh lord of the Domain due to Tsunakata's retirement.

sen.j: 文政6年（1823年）に大坂加番、文政10年（1827年）に奏者番に任じられるなど、要職を歴任して将来は老中にも期待された。
sen.e: He served several important positions by being appointed as Osaka-kaban (a person to guard Osaka-jo Castle) in 1823 and sojaban (an official in charge of the ceremonies) in 1827, and was expected to become roju (member of shogun's council of elders) in the future.
